Player History

Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...

Injured on 6/28/1985 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/5/1989, off John Stuper (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1989, off Greg Mathews (HOU)...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Philadelphia on 4/1/1993...
